definition: Jing, one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/surname Jing
Jing, one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/surname Jing
everything clear and orderly (idiom); neat and tidy

sentences.english: I've been keeping my room as neat as a pin, and the yard is always ship-shape.
sentences.chinese: 我一直保持房间井然有序，院子也是修得井井有条的。

sentences.english: trying to help get your house in order.
sentences.chinese: 帮你把家里安排得井井有条。

sentences.english: The cause of leakage and leakage resistance experiences in Ren456 Well were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了任456井井漏原因及堵漏经验。

sentences.english: She was aware that the Senator liked to do things with order and method.
sentences.chinese: 她明白参议员的事总喜欢办得有板有眼，井井有条。

sentences.english: Then water drilling and circulating for carrying cuttings was applied.
sentences.chinese: 下部使用清水强钻循环携砂的方法成功钻至固井井深。

sentences.english: Rita likes to keep everything in apple-pie order.
sentences.chinese: 丽塔喜欢把一切都弄得井井有条。

sentences.english: Say that finish, I put my own table in apple-pie order.
sentences.chinese: 说完，我把自己的桌子收拾得井井有条。

sentences.english: On the platform, producing wells can be located as close as 6ft apart.
sentences.chinese: 在平台上，生产井井距为6英尺那样小。

sentences.english: The book-keeper brought into order the complicated accounts of the merchant.
sentences.chinese: 会计将该商店复杂的帐务整顿得井井有条。

sentences.english: Before her guests arrived, the hostess had put her house in apple-pie order.
sentences.chinese: 在她的客人来到前，女主人要把屋子收拾得井井有条。

sentences.english: We try to keep the ship shipshape .
sentences.chinese: 我们尽量保持船井井有条。

sentences.english: And it all seemed to begin so well.
sentences.chinese: 一开始，一切似乎进行得井井有条。

sentences.english: Helen is a capable woman, after her arrangement, everything is in apple-pie order.
sentences.chinese: 海伦是个能干的女人，经她一安排，一切都井井有条。

sentences.english: His tools are always in apple-pie order.
sentences.chinese: 他的工具总是放得井井有条。

sentences.english: The traffic in this city is arranged in apple-pie order.
sentences.chinese: 这个城市的交通管理井井有条。

sentences.english: A laboratory must be kept in good order.
sentences.chinese: 实验室里必须保持井井有条。

definition: electric pumping station in irrigation system
Jing, one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/surname Jing
Macun district of Jiaozuo city 焦作市[Jiao1 zuo4 shi4], Henan
big/stream or canal/drain/ditch/CL:條|条[tiao2]/him (dialect)/outer rim of a carriage wheel (old)
earth embankment used to hold back or retain water/dike around a paddy field
Gaotang county in Liaocheng 聊城[Liao2 cheng2], Shandong
Mengcun Hui autonomous county in Cangzhou 滄州|沧州[Cang1 zhou1], Hebei
